cs.CV, cs.GR, cs.MM, cs.CG, cs.AI. 

The paper deals with 3D shape reconstruction from 2D images, which is a common problem in computer vision (cs.CV). The use of Laplacian meshes is a technique commonly used in computer graphics (cs.GR). The paper also mentions the use of linear least squares and optimization, which are common techniques in machine learning and computer graphics (cs.MM, cs.CG). Finally, the paper's approach involves using a reference image as a template, which is a technique commonly used in computer vision and machine learning (cs.AI).
